amendment.description: To specify that no Federal funds are to be used to establish, construct, or operate the National Women's History Museum.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1646 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1646 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S9584-9585; text: CR S9585) To specify that no Federal funds are to be used to establish, construct, or operate the National Women's History Museum.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1646 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Collins.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1646 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
